metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for elderly Indian American character with dog
metadata.content_note: All scenes are age-appropriate for children ages 5-12 and ESL learners

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: soft gray-blue pre-dawn light through paisley curtains
scenes.camera_view: wide shot of bedroom from doorway
scenes.description: A 72-year-old Indian American man with medium brown skin and thin white hair sleeps on the right side of a queen bed with a floral bedspread. His thick-framed rectangular glasses sit folded on the wooden nightstand beside a digital alarm clock glowing 6:30. A white weekly pill organizer rests next to the glasses case. His wife sleeps on the left side. The ceiling fan rotates slowly. Paisley curtains filter pale pre-dawn light. A small puja shelf in the corner holds brass Ganesh and Lakshmi statues.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, sleeping in queen bed with floral bedspread, thick rectangular glasses folded on wooden nightstand, digital alarm clock glowing red, pill organizer on nightstand, wife sleeping beside him, ceiling fan above, paisley curtains filtering gray-blue pre-dawn light, small Hindu puja shelf with brass Ganesh and Lakshmi in corner, peaceful bedroom, suburban home
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, no glasses, modern minimalist room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Putting On Glasses
scenes.description: Raj sits up on the edge of the queen bed, thin white hair slightly mussed from sleep. He wears a light blue cotton kurta pajama. His medium brown hands open the leather glasses case on the nightstand and carefully unfold thick-framed rectangular glasses, placing them on his face. Behind him, the floral bedspread is pushed aside. The digital alarm clock reads 6:32. Soft gray light seeps through the paisley curtains.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white mussed hair, trim gray mustache, sitting on edge of queen bed, wearing light blue cotton kurta pajama, opening brown leather glasses case on wooden nightstand, putting on thick rectangular glasses, floral bedspread pushed aside, digital alarm clock showing 6:32, gray morning light through paisley curtains, waking up routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, no glasses, no mustache, inappropriate

scenes.title: Praying with Folded Hands
scenes.lighting: warm golden light with incense smoke
scenes.description: Raj stands with both hands pressed together at chest level, fingers pointing upward, eyes closed in prayer. His lips move silently. Thin white hair catches the morning light. His rectangular glasses reflect the warm glow of a small brass diya oil lamp. Incense smoke drifts past the brass Ganesh statue. The puja shelf holds the lit diya, burning incense, two brass deities, a bowl of rice, and scattered marigold petals. A small red kumkum container and tiny silver spoon sit on the shelf edge.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses, wearing light blue kurta pajama, standing with hands pressed together in prayer at chest level, eyes closed, small Hindu puja shrine with brass Ganesh and Lakshmi statues, lit brass diya oil lamp, burning incense stick with smoke curling upward, bowl of rice and marigold petals as offerings, warm golden morning light, serene devotional moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, eyes open, inappropriate, disrespectful

scenes.title: Making the Bed
scenes.description: Raj pulls the floral bedspread up over the pillows, smoothing it with both hands. His weathered brown hands with age spots press out wrinkles methodically. The wooden nightstand holds his glasses case (empty), the pill organizer (today's compartment open and empty), the digital alarm clock showing 7:05, the reading lamp, and a hardcover book. The puja corner across the room has incense still burning. Morning sunlight fully illuminates the beige carpet and paisley curtains.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair neatly combed, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses, wearing white undershirt banian and loose cotton pants, pulling floral bedspread smooth over queen bed pillows, weathered brown hands with age spots pressing out wrinkles, wooden nightstand with pill organizer and alarm clock, puja corner with incense smoke in background, bright morning sunlight through paisley curtains, beige carpet, making bed routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, messy room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Looking at Grandchildren's Photos
scenes.description: Raj pauses at the wooden dresser, picking up a framed photograph of his grandchildren — a boy of about 7 and a girl of about 5, grinning at a birthday party, wearing pointed party hats, cake frosting on their cheeks. Raj's face softens with tenderness as he holds the frame in both hands. Morning light from the window falls across the photograph. Beside this frame, a graduation photo of daughter Priya shows a young woman in cap and gown. Raj straightens it too.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses, wearing light blue kurta pajama, standing at wooden dresser holding framed photograph of grandchildren at birthday party, tender expression, morning light on photo, other framed photos on dresser including graduation photo, dresser mirror reflecting, warm family moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, sad expression, inappropriate

scenes.title: Taking Morning Medication
scenes.description: Close-up of Raj's weathered brown hands with age spots picking up a prescription bottle from the medicine cabinet. He reads the label through rectangular glasses. He twists off the child-proof cap and taps a small white pill into his palm. A glass of water sits on the granite counter beside the electric toothbrush stand. He places the pill on his tongue and takes a careful sip of water. The medicine cabinet remains open, showing organized bottles inside. The non-slip mat is beneath his slippered feet.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, weathered brown hands with age spots, thick rectangular glasses, reading prescription bottle label, tapping white pill into palm, glass of water on granite counter beside electric toothbrush, open medicine cabinet with organized bottles, bright bathroom light, non-slip mat on floor, morning medication routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young hands, no age spots, dark hair, inappropriate, scary medical scene

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth
scenes.description: Raj brushes his teeth with an electric toothbrush, the device humming softly. White foam forms around his mouth and trim gray mustache. He watches his reflection in the medicine cabinet mirror — a 72-year-old man with medium brown skin, white hair, rectangular glasses. He tilts his head to reach the back molars. His light blue kurta pajama hangs loosely. The walk-in shower with chrome grab bars and frosted window are visible in the mirror behind him.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache with white toothpaste foam, thick rectangular glasses, brushing teeth with electric toothbrush, watching reflection in bathroom mirror, wearing light blue kurta pajama, walk-in shower with chrome grab bars visible behind, bright bathroom light, morning dental hygiene routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, no mustache, bathtub, inappropriate

scenes.title: Combing Hair
scenes.description: Raj picks up a wooden comb — wide-toothed, made of dark neem wood, polished from years of use. He runs it through his thin white hair, combing from the left side across the top. He parts it on the left side, a decades-long habit. His reflection shows careful grooming — trim gray mustache neat, glasses clean, hair combed into place. A few strands of white hair collect in the comb's teeth. The bright overhead light catches the silver in his hair.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, combing thin white silver hair with dark wooden neem comb, parting hair on left side, looking at reflection in bathroom mirror, trim gray mustache neatly groomed, thick rectangular glasses, bright bathroom light catching silver in hair, granite counter with aftershave bottle and toothbrush stand, grooming routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, thick hair, muscular, bald, inappropriate

scenes.title: Washing Face Before Bed
scenes.description: Raj washes his face at the sink with warm water and gentle face cleanser. He massages the cleanser over his medium brown cheeks, forehead, chin, and around his gray mustache. The warm water feels soothing after a long day. He rinses thoroughly, patting water around his closed eyes. Droplets cling to his thin white eyebrows. He reaches for the beige towel and pats his face dry gently. The grab bars in the walk-in shower gleam under the fluorescent light.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, washing face at bathroom sink, warm water running, massaging cleanser over cheeks and around gray mustache, eyes closed, water droplets on face, beige towel nearby on chrome ring, walk-in shower with grab bars visible behind, bright bathroom light, evening bedtime routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, shower scene, nudity, inappropriate

scenes.title: Brushing Teeth Before Bed
scenes.description: Raj brushes his teeth with the electric toothbrush for the second time today, the device humming. White foam forms around his mouth and gray mustache. He watches his reflection — the end-of-day version of himself, slightly more tired than the morning version. His rectangular glasses are set on the granite counter to avoid splatter. Without them, he squints slightly at his blurred reflection. He brushes methodically — a full two minutes, quadrant by quadrant.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache with toothpaste foam, squinting slightly without glasses (glasses resting on counter), brushing teeth with electric toothbrush at bathroom sink, end-of-day tired but content expression, bright bathroom light, evening dental routine, medicine cabinet mirror reflection
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, wearing glasses while brushing, inappropriate

scenes.title: Inspecting the Tomato Plants
scenes.description: Raj stands at the edge of the first raised bed, leaning forward to inspect tomato plants. The plants are nearly three feet tall with green stems supported by wooden stakes and tied with soft cotton string. Green tomatoes in various sizes hang from vines, some beginning to show orange-red. Raj gently cups a large green tomato in his gloved hand, examining it through rectangular glasses. His straw sun hat shades his face. The dark soil is slightly damp. Buddy lies in shade under the dogwood tree, watching.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair under straw sun hat, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses, wearing plaid shirt over white undershirt, green gardening gloves, standing at raised garden bed inspecting tomato plants, gently cupping green tomato in gloved hand, tall tomato plants with wooden stakes, green tomatoes on vines, golden-brown mixed breed dog lying in shade of tree watching, bright sunlight, suburban backyard garden
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, farm field, rural, no glasses, inappropriate

scenes.title: Watering the Herb Garden
scenes.description: Raj uncoils the green garden hose and directs water at the base of plants in the raised beds. Water darkens the soil and puddles around tomato roots. Mint plants release sharp fragrance as water splashes near them. His straw hat shades his face, rectangular glasses reflecting the green garden. Water droplets catch sunlight, sparkling. Buddy watches the hose stream with curiosity. The garden hose stretches across the green lawn in a loose curve.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair under straw sun hat, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses, wearing plaid shirt, watering raised garden beds with green garden hose, water stream darkening soil around tomato plants, mint plants nearby, water droplets sparkling in sunlight, golden-brown dog watching curiously, green lawn, wooden fence, bright sunlight suburban backyard garden
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, sprinkler system, no glasses, inappropriate

scenes.title: Reading the Newspaper
scenes.lighting: bright natural light through living room windows
scenes.description: Raj sits on the large brown comfortable sofa, legs crossed at ankles, local newspaper spread open across his lap. His rectangular glasses are perched on his nose. He wears white banian, gray cotton pants, and brown house slippers. A half-drunk cup of chai rests on a coaster on the wooden coffee table, next to a chess set with pieces mid-game. The wooden bookshelf holds engineering textbooks and Hindi novels. Indian artwork — a Mughal miniature painting — hangs on the wall. Buddy lies on his dark brown dog bed near the sofa.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses perched on nose, sitting on large brown sofa reading newspaper spread on lap, wearing white undershirt and gray pants, cup of chai on wooden coffee table next to chess set, bookshelf with books behind, Indian Mughal miniature painting on wall, golden-brown dog sleeping on dog bed nearby, bright natural light through windows, cozy suburban living room
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, modern minimalist room, no glasses, inappropriate

scenes.title: Opening Chess Move
scenes.description: Close-up of Raj's weathered brown fingers with age spots gripping a smooth wooden white pawn piece and setting it precisely on a square — the classic opening move. Across the table, Mr. Sharma strokes his white beard thoughtfully. The wooden chess board shows alternating light and dark squares with pieces in starting positions except two moved pawns. Raj leans back, arms crossed, studying the board through rectangular glasses. A paper cup of chai sits beside the board. Quiet murmurs of other players fill the room.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, weathered brown hands with age spots, moving white pawn on wooden chess board, thick rectangular glasses, trim gray mustache, wearing navy polo shirt, arms crossed studying board, elderly opponent with white beard across table, paper cup of chai beside board, indoor community center setting, fluorescent lighting, chess game opening move
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, alone, digital chess, inappropriate

scenes.title: Watching Cricket
scenes.lighting: warm lamp light and TV glow
scenes.description: Close-up of Raj watching a cricket match intently on TV, leaning forward slightly on the sofa. His rectangular glasses reflect the TV screen — players in white against a green pitch. His trim gray mustache moves as he comments on the bowler's technique. The 'World's Best Grandpa' chai mug is clutched in his right hand. His left hand rests on his knee, fingers tapping with nervous energy. The TV remote sits beside him. Behind him, lamplight illuminates the bookshelf and framed family photos. Buddy raises his head briefly at Raj's exclamation, then settles back.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, elderly Indian American man 72 years old, medium brown skin, thin white hair, trim gray mustache, thick rectangular glasses reflecting TV screen, sitting on brown sofa watching cricket match on television, leaning forward intently, holding 'World's Best Grandpa' chai mug, TV showing cricket players in white on green pitch, warm lamp light, bookshelf and family photos behind, golden-brown dog nearby on carpet, cozy evening living room scene
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, young man, dark hair, muscular, soccer/football on TV, no glasses, inappropriate
